modifiers.description: sticker_name:White Sticker | applies_to:joker;deck | effect_summary:Used this Joker to win on White Stake difficulty | permanence:record_only | notes:Stake progression record sticker

deck_name:Zodiac Deck | starting_rules_or_modifiers:Start run with Tarot Merchant , Planet Merchant , and Overstock | other_notes:Unlock condition: Win a run with any deck on the Red Stake difficulty or harder
sticker_name:Red Sticker | applies_to:joker;deck | effect_summary:Used this Joker to win on Red Stake difficulty | permanence:record_only | notes:Stake progression record sticker
deck_name:Painted Deck | starting_rules_or_modifiers:+2 hand size, -1 Joker slot | hand_size_delta:+2 | other_notes:Unlock condition: Win a run with any deck on the Green Stake difficulty or harder
sticker_name:Green Sticker | applies_to:joker;deck | effect_summary:Used this Joker to win on Green Stake difficulty | permanence:record_only | notes:Stake progression record sticker

deck_name:Anaglyph Deck | starting_rules_or_modifiers:After defeating each Boss Blind , gain a Double Tag | other_notes:Unlock condition: Win a run with any deck on the Black Stake difficulty or harder
sticker_name:Black Sticker | applies_to:joker;deck | effect_summary:Used this Joker to win on Black Stake difficulty | permanence:record_only | notes:Stake progression record sticker

sticker_name:Eternal Sticker | applies_to:joker | effect_summary:Cannot be sold or destroyed during the run | permanence:run_only | constraints:Appears in Black Stake+ runs; cannot coexist with Perishable | notes:Legendary Jokers do not naturally appear with Eternal

deck_name:Plasma Deck | starting_rules_or_modifiers:Balance Chips and Mult when calculating score for played hand X2 base Blind size | scoring_delta:Balance Chips and Mult when calculating score for played hand X2 base Blind size | other_notes:Unlock condition: Win a run with any deck on the Blue Stake difficulty or harder
sticker_name:Blue Sticker | applies_to:joker;deck | effect_summary:Used this Joker to win on Blue Stake difficulty | permanence:record_only | notes:Stake progression record sticker
sticker_name:Purple Sticker | applies_to:joker;deck | effect_summary:Used this Joker to win on Purple Stake difficulty | permanence:record_only | notes:Stake progression record sticker
deck_name:Erratic Deck | starting_rules_or_modifiers:All Ranks and Suits in deck are randomized | other_notes:Unlock condition: Win a run with any deck on the Orange Stake difficulty or harder
sticker_name:Orange Sticker | applies_to:joker;deck | effect_summary:Used this Joker to win on Orange Stake difficulty | permanence:record_only | notes:Stake progression record sticker

sticker_name:Gold Sticker | applies_to:joker;deck | effect_summary:Used this Joker to win on Gold Stake difficulty Note: This sticker is slightly larger than the others | permanence:record_only | notes:Stake progression record sticker

sticker_name:Perishable Sticker | applies_to:joker | effect_summary:Joker is debuffed after 5 rounds | permanence:run_only | constraints:Appears in Orange/Gold Stake runs; cannot coexist with Eternal | notes:Legendary Jokers do not naturally appear with Perishable

sticker_name:Rental Sticker | applies_to:joker | effect_summary:Costs $1 to buy, deducts $3 at end of each round | permanence:run_only | constraints:Appears in Gold Stake runs; can coexist with Eternal or Perishable | notes:Cost deduction happens before round payout
